txt.en: 'Each day we offer a few tickets to Faire-goers to sample the games we have available - try out Maggot's Mushrooms over at the Bamfurlongs, or the Egg Scramble down at Farmer Sandson's place!\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>Note: If you would like to purchase additional tickets, they'll be available from the LOTRO Store via the hobbits who run the games!</rgb>'
'Here are your tickets, [placeholder]! Have fun and enjoy the Faire!'

The annual Farmers Faire is in town for the harvest! Each day you may claim a few tickets for free to try out some of the events offered in the Faire.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>
Claim your tickets to the Farmers Faire
A Festival Announcer can be found in the centre of Bywater during the Farmers Faire festival.\n\nYou should speak with her to claim your free Festival Tickets!
